title: Flat Rate Pricing Option
description: Flat rate pricing for DOOH, sponsorships, and time-based campaigns - fixed cost regardless of delivery volume

pricing_option_id.description: Unique identifier for this pricing option within the product (e.g., 'flat_rate_usd_24h_takeover')

pricing_model.description: Fixed cost regardless of delivery volume

is_fixed.description: Whether this is a fixed rate (true) or auction-based (false)

parameters.description: Flat rate parameters for DOOH and time-based campaigns

duration_hours.description: Duration in hours for time-based flat rate pricing (DOOH)

sov_percentage.description: Guaranteed share of voice as percentage (DOOH, 0-100)

loop_duration_seconds.description: Duration of ad loop rotation in seconds (DOOH)

min_plays_per_hour.description: Minimum number of times ad plays per hour (DOOH frequency guarantee)

venue_package.description: Named venue package identifier for DOOH (e.g., 'times_square_network', 'airport_terminals')

estimated_impressions.description: Estimated impressions for this flat rate option (informational, commonly used with SOV or time-based DOOH)

min_spend_per_package.description: Minimum spend requirement per package using this pricing option, in the specified currency
